main event: Several unidentified flying objects were sighted over Azerbaijan on 16 November 1957.
interesting points: The first report noted 21 objects resembling 'firecrackers' appearing in the southern sky at high speed., The objects changed direction sharply multiple times during the observation., They were tracked by the 13th Air Force Control Radar Station and other ground observers., The objects were seen at altitudes of 1-2 thousand feet for about 15-20 minutes., The observation occurred under clear weather conditions with a full moon.
witness description: Air Force Control Radar Station and several other observers on the ground
